metadata.name: Big Me Little Me
metadata.description:
The work began with a physical oil painting created in 2022 which I then digitized and animated. It is part of the Declaration of Independence collection because it represents my celebration of the freedom web3 affords me.  
The glitch and animation where created in Photoshop and Procreate. There are several glitch rates and 20 frames. I also create  a high resolution version of 2,223px X 3,000px but since it doesn't display in most platforms I will be happy to provide to whoever asks.
